title: Friction At First Look Media Spills Into Public View
teaser: Internal tension at the digital journalism outfit First Look spilled into public view this week. As First Look itself reported, a spat between journalists and the company's billionaire founder ended with the departure of one of its most prominent employees, writer Matt Taibbi.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
